items.description: Sprayed edges are everywhere now, but are they good or bad for the publishing industry?

items.title: Horror About the Power of Nature and the Environment
items.description: Anyone who's seen videos of the open ocean or about parasitic fungi knows that nature is scary. These eight reads explore just that.
